title: Policing Special: How To Enforce A Lockdown
itunes:title: Policing Special: How To Enforce A Lockdown
description:
With new virus rules coming in next week, and Christmas just round the corner, today's special focuses on policing the lockdown.


Two police and crime commissioners, Conservative Katy Bourne of Sussex and Labour's Alan Billings in South Yorkshire, tell Bloomberg Westminster's Roger Hearing and Sebastian Salek about the challenges of making sure a fatigued public follow the rules.


Plus, Hartlepool Council leader Shane Moore shares his gripes about a central government that he says still isn't communicating properly with local authorities.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
